S. rep. |leader_name3 = |established_date = |unit_pref = US |area_footnotes = |area_total_sq_mi = 10.918 |area_land_sq_mi = 10.917 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.001 |area_total_km2 = 28.279 |area_land_km2 = 28.276 |area_water_km2 = 0.003 |area_water_percent = 0.01 |elevation_ft = 2434 |elevation_m = 742 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 988 |population_metro = |population_density_sq_mi = auto |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 93527 |area_code_type = Area codes |area_code = 442/760 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank1_info = , }} Inyokern (formerly Siding 16 and Magnolia) is a census-designated place (CDP) in Kern County, California, United States. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Kern County, California
